snippet: In 1971 Ted Kotcheff’s “Wake in Fright” brought attention to the revival of the Australian film industry.
abstract: Ted Kotcheff, currently an executive producer on Law & Order: SVU, helped herald the rebirth of Australia's film industry in the 1970s with his 1971 classic Wake in Fright; film has been vividly restored and is now in a week-long run at the Film Forum.
lead_paragraph: In 1971 Ted Kotcheff’s “Wake in Fright” brought attention to the revival of the Australian film industry.

headline.seo: ‘Wake in Fright’ and Australian New Wave
headline.main: Finding a Renaissance in the Gritty Red Dust
headline.print_headline: Finding a Renaissance In the Gritty Red Dust
